Automate your browser - record and replay your actions seamlessly for enhanced productivity. No coding required. 

Action Replay is a powerful Chrome extension designed to streamline your web interactions by recording and simulating your actions. Whether youâ€™re filling out forms, navigating websites, or automating repetitive tasks, Action Replay captures every keystroke and click, allowing you to replay them effortlessly.

Key Features:

Record Actions: Seamlessly record all your keystrokes and mouse clicks on the current tab with just a click of a button. Capture everything from simple navigation to complex workflows.

Simulate Actions: Replay your recorded actions with precision. Watch as Action Replay simulates your keystrokes and clicks exactly as you performed them, making repetitive tasks a breeze.

Easy to Use Interface: User-friendly design ensures you can start recording and simulating actions without any technical knowledge.

Customizable Playback Speed: Adjust the playback speed of your clicks & keystrokes to suit your needs, whether you want to run them in real-time or speed through repetitive tasks quickly.

Error Handling: Built-in error handling ensures smooth playback by skipping or retrying failed actions, providing a reliable automation experience.

Use Cases:

Form Filling Automation: Automatically fill out repetitive online forms such as job applications, surveys, and registration forms, saving time and reducing errors.

E-commerce Transactions: Automate the checkout process on e-commerce websites, ensuring consistent and error-free transactions.

Website Testing: Perform automated testing of website functionality by simulating user interactions, making it easier to identify and fix issues.

Data Entry: Speed up data entry tasks by recording the process of inputting data into web forms or databases, ensuring accuracy and consistency.

Features on the Way:

Multiple Script Slots: Store different recordings in multiple script slots, allowing you to manage and switch between various automated tasks easily.

Collaborative Sharing: Share your recordings with colleagues or friends, enabling collaborative automation and workflow sharing.

Advanced Editing: Edit your recorded actions with a detailed editor, allowing you to fine-tune each step for optimal performance.

Hotkey Support: Quickly start, stop, and manage your recordings using customizable hotkeys for a more efficient workflow.

Transform the way you interact with the web with Action Replay. Automate, simplify, and enhance your online experience by recording and simulating your actions with ease.
